job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: kpmg new zealand is part of the international kpmg network and is passionate about providing the best audit tax and advisory services to clientsltbrgtltbrgtkpmg lighthouse provides specialised data and analytics talent and datadriven solutions that help our clients achieve rapid results kpmg lighthouse works with large data sets and leverages deep domain expertise in data engineering data science advanced visualisation artificial intelligence and robotics to help us better serve our clientsltbrgtltbrgtltstronggt the opportunity ltbrgtltstronggtltulgtltligtour data and analytics practice is growing and were looking for a data scientist who will be responsible for analyzing large data sets to develop custom models and algorithms to identify opportunities to drive business solutionsltbrgtltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggt day to day you will ltbrgtltstronggtltulgtltligtuse advanced analytics techniques to solve challenging business questions relating to optimising customer experience generating revenue reducing cost and managing riskltligtltligtuse advanced analytics statistical techniques such as predictive modelling machine learning clustering natural language processing and forecastingltligtltligtdevelop custom data models and algorithms to apply to datasetsltligtltligtprocess transform and integrate disparate data sourcesltligtltligtexplore and transform raw datasets to draw meaningful insightsltligtltligtwork with stakeholders throughout the organisation to identify opportunities to leverage data to drive business solutionsltligtltligtkeep up with latest trends in the industry and with the latest technologies for data manipulationltligtltulgtwhat youll bring to our teamltbrgtltulgtltligtqualification in computer science information science statistics physics mathematics or another quantitative fieldltligtltligt to years hands on experience preferably in a consulting environmentltligtltligtexperience using programming languages python sql c scala etc to manipulate data and draw insights from large data setsltligtltligtprior experience preparing data for analysis building predictive models and machine learning algorithms on large scale platforms and helping to drive innovation into the modelling processofferingsltligtltligtexperience with cloud platforms eg aws azure andor google cloudltligtltligtfamiliarity with data manipulation and visualization tools and libraries power bi tableau pandasnumpy scikitlearn apache sparkltligtltligtexcellent written and verbal communication skills with proven ability to work with crossfunctional teams to translate business issues into potential analytics solutionsltligtltulgtwe offer rewarding careers for outstanding professionals ongoing learning and development opportunities a collaborative and inclusive culture and flexible and agile work practices that focus on our peoples wellbeing to drive innovation and entrepreneurship we also believe that our business plays a distinct and vital role in helping solve important social and environmental issues and use our unique skills and expertise to help create positive and lasting impacts for our communitiesltbrgtltbrgtwe believe diversity of thought background and experience strengthens relationships and delivers meaningful benefits to our people our clients and communities we strive to be recognised as an employer of choice for all irrespective of gender ethnicity generation flexible work status family circumstances sexual orientation or disability and our inclusive culture promotes the development of our people nationwideltbrgtltbrgtto be legally entitled to work in new zealand you should be a new zealand citizen resident or australian citizen permanent resident or alternatively you must hold a valid work visa for new zealand please check the new zealand immigration website for the most up to date informationltbrgtltbrgtwe are a circle back initiative employer we commit to respond to every applicant
